name: The First Flame (scruff_duff)
description:
This game was made in a week for the Camp Fire Coworks Game Jam; I may have bitten off more than I could chew with this one and because of that I ran out of time to add features that I would consider key to the core gameplay loop. The most notable of these features being animals; the lack of animals means that there is no need to craft weapons as there is nothing to fight.

Goal:

  • Due to not having time to finish the ending I planned, the goal is to survive as long as you can.
  • Keep yourself alive by keeping the hunger bar (green), thirst bar (blue), and the health bar (red) above 0.

Features:

  • Crafting Items
  • Day & Night Cycle
  • Melee Weapons + Bow & Arrow
  • Procedural World Generation
  • Cook meat over the fire

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Shift to run (care your get hungry!)
  • Mouse to look around
  • Tab to Open Inventory
  • Mouse 1 to use the tool in your hand.
  • F to interact with objects
  • Click on the crafting icons to craft and the icons of food to eat them.  

I had a lot of fun working on this game and proud of it from a technical aspect; I might continue developing it in the future. Any feedback or bugs would be appreciated as always!
